[h1] Adds spiders to RimWorld.
Save game compatible. Tameable. Spawn rate settings available in the Mod Settings menu.
A Dog Said Patch (Bionic Spiders) : Now Available http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1123112225
Available in: English / Deutsch (Lauri7x3) / ру́сский язы́к (kr33man) / Français (NorX Aengell) / Português (KaiserThurston)
------------ Features ------------[/h1]
[b]Adds Spiders and Giant Spiders[/b] [list] [*]Eight-legged critters able to weave webs out of incredibly useful silk. [*]Giant genetically-engineered intelligent nephilids the size of a muffalo. [/list]
[b]Adds Flying Spider Queens[/b] [list] [*]A genetic experiment gone wrong, flying spider queens are capable of creating giant spider eggs and flying short distances. [/list]
[b]Adds Webs.[/b] [list] [*]Webs stun smaller animals for spiders to catch. [*]Webs can be harvested for spider silk. [/list]
[b]Adds Cocoons[/b] [list] [*]Spiders spin dead or downed prey into cocoons. [*]Cocoons will be carried by spiders to other cocoons to help make a spider home. [*]Cocoons can have their insides melted, making delicious juice for spiders. [/list]
[b]Adds Spider Silk[/b] [list] [*]Webs and cocoons will occasionally drop spider silk that can be used in creating clothing. [/list]
[h1] ------------ To Do ------------ [/h1] [list] [*] Add proper flying to Spider Queens. [*] Add "milkable" spider silk. [/list]
